Class TripleBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.sindice.rdfcommons.TripleBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Triple>, TripleSet
public class TripleBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements TripleSet

Defines a buffer of triples.
